text: Au gaa dudu nia hale daumaha o nia balu god o Egypt, gei di king o Babylonia gaa dudu nia ada god digaula, be gaa kae nia maa gi daha mo tenua deenei. E hai gadoo be di hagaloohi siibi dela ma ga haga madammaa nia gudu gi daha mo dono gahu, dela gadoo di hai o di king Babylonia ma ga haga madammaa tenua Egypt, gaa lawa gaa hana i nia madamada o dono aali.
